mapper.select: select * from role where name = #{name} and password = #{password} and role = #{role}
mapper.insert: insert into milk(gname, price, store, createtime, recommend, rate, cata, stage, age, bid, img) value (#{gname},#{price},#{store},#{createtime},#{recommend},#{rate},#{cata},#{stage},#{age},#{bid},#{img})
